member.summary: In this selection mode the weight is used for every pick of .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience.WeightedGroupSelectionMode.InitialAttempt
member.summary: In this selection mode the weight is only used to pick initial . Remaining groups are picked in order, starting from the first, finishing with last and skipping already picked group.
